# Web Designer Instructions

## Project Overview
This document outlines the guidelines and standards for web design contributions to the app-treinamento-cariri project.

## Design Principles
- **User-Centered Design**: Always prioritize user experience and accessibility
- **Consistency**: Maintain visual and functional consistency across all pages
- **Responsiveness**: Ensure designs work seamlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
- **Performance**: Optimize assets to maintain fast load times

## Design System
- Follow the established color palette and typography
- Use the component library for consistent UI elements
- Document new components before implementation

## File Organization
